description: This chocolate box Bedfordshire village is famous for the Shuttleworth Museum of historic airplanes and motor vehicles at Old Warden Aerodrome. The area also includes Old Warden Park where there are some lovely Swiss gardens, parkland walks and pretty lakes. This circular walk takes you around the village and up to the historic church. You can extend the walk by continuing north to pick up the Greensand Ridge Walk , a long-distance walk of 40 miles (64 km) that traverses the county of Bedfordshire. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Old Warden. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
